scripts.build: better-npm-run build:common && better-npm-run build:es5 && better-npm-run build:es6

betterScripts.build:common: node-sass ./src/axui-datagrid/style.scss dist/style.css --output-style compressed && rimraf ./dist/scss && ncp ./src/axui-datagrid/style.scss ./dist/style.scss && ncp ./src/axui-datagrid/scss ./dist/scss && ncp ./README.md ./dist/README.md
